item.title: Self-reliance of intellectuals
item.description: After completing my post-graduation from IIT Bombay and before joining my new job in Noida, I was at home when my mother asked me about my classmates: where are they and what are they doing. I told her that I know few of them and most of them are in ‘videsh’ (read Europe or US) for work or higher studies. Hearing this, she made a pitiful face and said with deep sympathy, ‘Ha!
